text: What is the best way to combine two data frames? I was examining joins from the DataFrames.jl docs and, based on my data which is two datasets having the same columns but uniquely valued rows, I was thinking about applying an `innerjoin` or `crossjoin`. But, in this case, how is the efficiency different from say `vcat(df_1, df_2)`?
